name: First Cat on the Moon - starring Bobo The Cat
name_original: First Cat on the Moon - starring Bobo The Cat
description:
This is a cute and easy mini Jump'N'Run but also a combination of testrooms for the physics and controls of my upcoming  games (containing lots of reused and placeholder assets). You can speedrun it in 3 minutes or explore a bit more, solve the optional puzzles,  discover all the changes I made for this new game or find secret rooms to discover the treasure that only the most capable Explorers get to marvel at.

If you don't like the colors of the menus, you can easily change them by editing the colorgradients of the saves on the File Select Screen (This might change other details aswell).

This game supports:

Keyboard Controls, PS5 Controller, PS4 Controller, Xbox Series X Controller, Xbox 360 Controller.

You can look up or change the key assignment in the Options Menu.

Graphic settings:

If the game doesn't run with constant framerate your GPU might be overloaded. To solve this you can press "3" on your keyboard to switch to 30 FPS-mode  or/and slightly reduce the game speed. Press "4" to decrease Game Speed and "5" if you want to reincrease it. The framerate may also become unstable/jittery after shrinking or minimizing the window. Just press "escape" to switch back to fullscreen or press it twice when the game is already in fullscreen mode to resynchronize it.

The music of this game is not mixed like pop music, the dynamic range comes across best over high quality headphones or sound systems. You can also use PC speakers but many details may be lost and the mix might sound unbalanced.

Since this game is supposed to test one thing or the other, it would be very helpful if you could assist me in the comment section.
